DOC.brief_title: Expanding HIV Testing Prevention Reach Vulnerable Young Women
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study test gender-focused comprehensive HIV test counselling ( HTC ) program , Young Women 's CoOperative ( YWC ) standard HTC program 24 disadvantaged community Cape Town , South Africa . The researcher conduct community-level randomization across 24 community balance recruitment predominantly Black African predominantly Coloured disadvantaged community . The aim study : Aim 1 . To train evaluate adolescent peer role model conduct community outreach establish outreach worker recruit 500 out-of-school , substance-using female adolescent age 16 19 HIV test counseling ( HTC ) co-facilitate gender-focused comprehensive HTC program . Aim 2 . To test efficacy young woman 's gender-focused comprehensive HTC program reduce substance use , victimization , sexual risk behavior ( primary outcome ) improve access effective treatment support service linkages care ( substance abuse treatment , HIV , sexually transmitted infection [ STIs ] , antenatal reproductive health secondary outcome ) relative standard HTC adolescent female . The Young Women 's CoOperative adapt South African Women 's Health CoOperative ( WHC ) North Carolina Young Women 's CoOperative ( YWHC ) find acceptable recent focus group maintain core element evidence-based intervention . For study , intervention co-facilitated trained peer local community . The intervention currently consist two 1.5-hour group workshop ( session ) , several module usually administer week apart : Workshop 1 : Developmental Issues Alcohol Other Drugs ; Gender , Problem-Solving Conflict Negotiation , Violence Values Becoming Powerful Young Woman : Workshop 2 : STIs , HIV/AIDS , Prevention , Condoms Role-play . After session , participant develop risk-reduction personalize action plan ( PAP ) . To maintain PAP goal reduce decay intervention effect time , staff conduct bi-monthly case management help participant attain personal goal . Participants complete baseline , 6-month follow-up 12-month follow-up assessment , include survey biological test substance use , pregnancy HIV .
